_documentation.description: Sync configuration for tag-based contact filtering
notes: Empty sync_groups array means 'sync all contacts' (backwards compatible)
Groups can be specified by display name ('Work') or resource name ('contactGroups/123abc')
Both accounts can have independent filter configurations
Contact is included if it belongs to ANY of the specified groups (OR logic)
Case-insensitive matching is used for display names

account1._comment: Account 1 configuration - sync only contacts in Work, Family, or a specific group by ID

account2._comment: Account 2 configuration - sync all contacts (empty array = no filtering)
